content:
FilterRepeater Class

In this Article

Represents a control that enumerates table columns that can be filtered.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(false)]
[System.Web.UI.ParseChildren(true)]
public class FilterRepeater : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater, System.Web.DynamicData.IWhereParametersProvider

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Control
  • System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater
  • FilterRepeater

Remarks

This type is obsolete. Use QueryableFilterRepeater, instead.

In this topic:

  • Introduction

  • Declarative Syntax

Introduction

The FilterRepeater control is a control in the ASP.NET Dynamic Data framework. It automatically renders controls that can be used to filter data rows that are displayed for a table. The filters work by providing a list of Where parameters to the data source for each supported column type. By default, Dynamic Data filters foreign-key and Boolean columns and renders them by using a DropDownList list control.

The FilterRepeater control is a specialized Repeater control that automatically binds to a collection of filterable columns for the table that is displayed in the current page. For example, if a request is made for /Products/List.aspx, the FilterRepeater control binds to the columns in the Products table. The table is chosen based on the route that matches the request. It can also be overridden by setting the TableName and ContextTypeName properties of the FilterRepeater control.

To display the filter UI, the ItemTemplate template of the FilterRepeater control must contain a control with a known ID. By default, the known ID is "DynamicFilter". The control in the item template must derive from FilterUserControlBase. When data binding occurs, the FilterRepeater control initializes an instance of the filter control with information about the column to filter.

Declarative Syntax

<asp:FilterRepeater  
    ContextTypeName="string"  
    DataMember="string"  
    DataSource="string"  
    DataSourceID="string"  
    DynamicFilterContainerId="string"  
    EnableTheming="True|False"  
    EnableViewState="True|False"  
    ID="string"  
    OnDataBinding="DataBinding event handler"  
    OnDisposed="Disposed event handler"  
    OnInit="Init event handler"  
    OnItemCommand="ItemCommand event handler"  
    OnItemCreated="ItemCreated event handler"  
    OnItemDataBound="ItemDataBound event handler"  
    OnLoad="Load event handler"  
    OnPreRender="PreRender event handler"  
    OnUnload="Unload event handler"  
    runat="server"  
    TableName="string"  
    Visible="True|False"  
>  
        <AlternatingItemTemplate>  
            <!-- child controls -->  
        </AlternatingItemTemplate>  
        <FooterTemplate>  
            <!-- child controls -->  
        </FooterTemplate>  
        <HeaderTemplate>  
            <!-- child controls -->  
        </HeaderTemplate>  
        <ItemTemplate>  
            <!-- child controls -->  
        </ItemTemplate>  
        <SeparatorTemplate>  
            <!-- child controls -->  
        </SeparatorTemplate>  
</asp:FilterRepeater>

Constructors summary

FilterRepeater()

Initializes a new instance of the FilterRepeater class.

Properties summary

ContextTypeName

Gets or sets the name of the data-source object to use to retrieve the data.
DynamicFilterContainerId

Gets or sets the ID of the FilterRepeater control in an stem.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate* instance.
Table

Gets the table that is associated with the FilterRepeater control.
TableName

Gets the name of the table to filter.
Visible

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is displayed.

Methods summary

DataBind()

Binds the FilterRepeater control to the data that is retrieved from a data source.
GetFilteredColumns()

Returns an enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current FilterRepeater control.
GetWhereParameters(IDynamicDataSource)

Gets the list of Where parameters to add to the Where parameter collection of the FilterRepeater control.
OnFilterItemCreated(RepeaterItem)

Called for every item and alternating item template that is being instantiated by this FilterRepeater control during data binding.
OnInit(EventArgs)

Raises the Init event to initialize the FilterRepeater control.
OnItemCreated(RepeaterItemEventArgs)

Raises the ItemCreated event.

Constructors

  • FilterRepeater()

    Initializes a new instance of the FilterRepeater class.

    public FilterRepeater ();

Properties

  • ContextTypeName

    Gets or sets the name of the data-source object to use to retrieve the data.

    public string ContextTypeName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the data source object to use to retrieve the data.

  • DynamicFilterContainerId

    Gets or sets the ID of the FilterRepeater control in an stem.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate* instance.

    public string DynamicFilterContainerId { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The ID of the control used to display the filter UI in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate* instance, if an ID is specified; otherwise, "DynamicFilter".

  • Table

    Gets the table that is associated with the FilterRepeater control.

    public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable Table { get; }

    Property Value

    • MetaTable

      The table that is associated with the FilterRepeater control.

  • TableName

    Gets the name of the table to filter.

    public string TableName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the table to filter.

  • Visible

    Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is displayed.

    public override bool Visible { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the control is displayed; otherwise false.

Methods

  • DataBind()

    Binds the FilterRepeater control to the data that is retrieved from a data source.

    public override void DataBind ();
  • GetFilteredColumns()

    Returns an enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current FilterRepeater control.

    protected virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn> GetFilteredColumns ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable<MetaColumn>

      An enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current FilterRepeater control.

    Remarks

    By default, foreign-key columns and Boolean columns are sortable.

  • GetWhereParameters(IDynamicDataSource)

    Gets the list of Where parameters to add to the Where parameter collection of the FilterRepeater control.

    public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> GetWhereParameters (System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource);

    Parameters

    • dataSource
      IDynamicDataSource

      The data source of the Where parameters.

    Returns

    • IEnumerable<Parameter>

      A list of Where parameters.

  • OnFilterItemCreated(RepeaterItem)

    Called for every item and alternating item template that is being instantiated by this FilterRepeater control during data binding.

    protected virtual void OnFilterItemCreated (System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem item);

    Parameters

    • item
      RepeaterItem

      The contents of the item template.

    Remarks

    You can override this method to customize the contents of the item template while the items are being created. Data is available for each item when this method is called.

  • OnInit(EventArgs)

    Raises the Init event to initialize the FilterRepeater control.

    protected override void OnInit (EventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      EventArgs

      The event data.

  • OnItemCreated(RepeaterItemEventArgs)

    Raises the ItemCreated event.

    protected override void OnItemCreated (System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemEventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      RepeaterItemEventArgs

      The event data.

    Remarks

    The ItemCreated event is raised when an item is created in the Repeater control.
